# Introduction
The `ggvis` package is an extension of `ggplot` developed by Hadley Wickham
that incorporates elements of modern web design to create interactive/manipulatable
graphics. This is accomplished by moving away from static rendering in `.png`, `.jpg`,
or `.eps` to html5 and vega.js.
